data.lore: Amumu is a diminutive, animated cadaver who wanders the world, trying to discover his true identity. He rose from an ancient Shuriman tomb bound in corpse wrappings with no knowledge of his past, consumed with an uncontrollable sadness.
data.name: Amumu
data.title: the Sad Mummy

spells.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.sanitizedDescription: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

spells.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.
spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.
spells.name: Despair
spells.sanitizedDescription: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks. Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.name: Tantrum
spells.sanitizedDescription: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.
spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.
spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.sanitizedDescription: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.

passive.name: Cursed Touch
passive.description: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.
